description.value:
Frequency once per day

Edara embraces the full effect of her mixed blood and holy power, making it her own, screaming out in rage, pain, and defiance. Reality buckles and twists under her sudden power—she transforms, becoming Large and surrounded by pink flame and bloodglass. Her wings grow massive, her second pair becoming capable of bearing her weight. A flash of light explodes from her as a magenta halo forms around her horns.

Every creature within 10 feet of her is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round unless they succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save using her class DC. Her final form has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-relic-bloodglass.bloodglass-gifts.Item.5LJHoaYFUEo97DpJ]{Divine Vessel}. Her final form resembles a massive succubus and fairy, with some angelic features. She remains in that form for 1 minute. While in her final form, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sRfSBHWHdbIa0aGc]{Chilling Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} as 6th-rank divine innate spells, once each per use of this feat.

When she emerges from her final form, she becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}. 

Special At the GM's discretion, the specific elements of this feat can be adjusted to better fit the tiefling's lineage—for example, a GM might decide that a particular beastbrood tiefling could cast a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} instead of fireball.
